images.alt: drumstick chockolate fudge brownie king cones

text: The iconic DRUMSTICK experience is now available in a tub! Everything you love about DRUMSTICK Vanilla Caramel cones -- creamy vanilla flavoured frozen dessert with a delicious caramel ripple, praline roasted peanuts, and crunchy chocolatey-covered wafer pieces -- are now all mixed together in a scoopable, shareable treat, perfect for enjoying with friends and family. Proudly crafted in Ontario, Canada, DRUMSTICK Vanilla Caramel is made with Canadian dairy and has no artificial colours. Create some joyful memories with DRUMSTICK Vanilla Caramel frozen dessert and try our other DRUMSTICK tub flavours -- Strawberry Cheesecake and Chocolate Fudge Brownie. DRUMSTICK, the original sundae cone experience since 1928.
Now Available In A Tub: The iconic DRUMSTICK experience is now available in a tub, perfect for sharing with family and friends
Layers Of Fun: Creamy vanilla flavoured frozen dessert with a delicious caramel ripple, praline roasted peanuts, and crunchy chocolatey-covered wafer pieces
From Canada With Love: DRUMSTICK Vanilla Caramel tubs are crafted in Canada and made with Canadian dairy
Just the Good Stuff: Prepared with no artificial colours
More DRUMSTICK Fun: Enjoy our DRUMSTICK cones!
Since 1928: The original sundae cone experience since 1928

Modified milk ingredients, Sugars (sugar, glucose, sweetened condensed milk, brown sugar, glucose-fructose), Milk ingredients, Coconut oil, Peanuts, Water, Wheat flour, Unsweetened chocolate, Salt, Cocoa, Palm oil shortening, Mono- and diglycerides, Soy lecithin, Propylene glycol monostearate, Cellulose gum, Carrageenan, Carob bean gum, Sodium citrate, Potassium sorbate, Citric acid, Annatto, Natural and artificial flavour.
